title: FS 1910 and 1911 Obak BEATERs...not for the faint of heart

posts.post_title: FS 1910 and 1911 Obak BEATERs...not for the faint of heart
posts.post_content:
So...here they are...some truly rough Obak beaters for sale. Check out the scans! Prices include creases, hole punches, paper loss, trimming, chipping, staining, writing, tears, and general ugliness...oh and shipping! Email or PM is fine. Paypal, Check, MO is fine. Thanks for looking,
Joshua

1911 Obaks: 
Nourse Sacramento  $SOLD
Schmidt San Fran.   $SOLD
Agnew Los Angeles  $12

1910 Obak 175 Series:  
Greggs Portland $SOLD

Perry Sac.        $15
Spiesman Oak.   $15
H. Smith L.A.     $15
